articles.title: Bank Of Maharashtra Posts Highest Growth In Deposit Mobilisation Among PSU Banks In Q3 - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Bank of Maharashtra leads PSU banks in Q3 deposit growth at 17.895%, followed by SBI at 12.84%.
articles.content: However, SBI's total deposits were about 18.5 times higher at Rs 45,67,927 crore, as compared to Rs 2,45,734 crore of BoM in absolute terms.
